K8S-BMKS

START: cheatSheet: useful commands
-------------------- YAML -------------------
AUDITPOLICY: auditPolicy spec
CRONJOB: cronjbo spec
DEPLOY: sample nginx deployment spec
INGRESS: ingress spec
NETWORKPOLICY: spec
POD: configMap as env
POD: env as configMapRef [all values]
POD: env as configMapKeyRef [single value]
POD: inline environmental variables
POD: livenessProbe [command]
POD: livenessProbe [http]
POD: imagePullSecrets
POD: nodeAffinity
POD: nodeSelector
POD: command and args
POD: env from secretRef
POD: projected volume [sa token]
POD: persistentVolumeClaim
POD: tolerations
POD: volume mount [emptyDir]
POD: volume mount [hostPath]
POD: securityContext [basic config]
PV: pv spec
PVC: pvc spec
RUNTIME-CLASS: spec
SERVICE: nodePort
SERVICE: loadBlancer
---------------- TASKS ----------------
ADMISSION-CONTROLLER: configure ImagePolicyWebhook
CLUSTER: installation
CLUSTER: upgrade
CSR: create and execute
DASHBOARD: deploy dashboard
DEPLOY: update deployment and set new image
DNS: debug DNS
DNS: test resolution
ETCD: create backup
KUBELET: config options
KUBE-API: admissionPlugins [default admission plugins]
NETPOL: limit ingress
NETPOL: namespace selector
NODE: taint node to be unschedulable
POD: configure pulling images from private repository
POD: configure resources limits
POD: configure sidecar container with logging agent
POD: configure initContainer
ROLE: create via YAML
ROLE: create imperatively
ROLEBINDING: create imperatively
ROLEBINGIND: creating declaratively
SECRET: decode secret values
---------------- CKS ONLY ----------------
APPARMOR: Documentation
APPARMOR: restrict a container's access
AUDITPOLICY: implement audit policy
FALCO: output fields
FALCO: default rules
KUBELET: enable certificates Rotation for the Kubelet
PSP: podSecurityPolicy resource
POD: securityContext [capabilities]
POD: securityContext [container level add capabilities]
POD: securityContext [container level runAs]
POD: securityContext [pod level runAs]
RUNTIMECLASS: usage
SECCOMP: seccompProfile [restrict pod]
SYSDIG: documentation
TRIVY: documentation
